svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - March 23 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
March 23, 2024" date: "2024-03-22"
Eth News and Links
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600 )
• Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Proposal to set
default local block boost to 10% Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) EIP7251 maxEB
(increase max effective balance): added to Pectra EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) : considered for
inclusion in Pectra, review in 4 weeks, doing both maxEB + IL increases upgrade complexity and
deprioritizes peerDAS EIP7659 increase blob throughput proposal to increase to target of 8 & maximum
of 16 blobs per block (up from 3/6) over 4 months Light client proposals : EIP7658 light client data
backfill & EIP7657 sync committee slashings P2P proposals: network shards, IDONTWANT control message &
deprecate mplex
Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
• Proposal to set default local block boost to 10%
Proposal to set default local block boost to 10%
• Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) EIP7251 maxEB (increase max effective balance):
added to Pectra EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) : considered for inclusion in Pectra, review in 4 weeks,
doing both maxEB + IL increases upgrade complexity and deprioritizes peerDAS EIP7659 increase blob
throughput proposal to increase to target of 8 & maximum of 16 blobs per block (up from 3/6) over 4
months Light client proposals : EIP7658 light client data backfill & EIP7657 sync committee slashings
Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024)
• EIP7251 maxEB (increase max effective balance): added to Pectra
EIP7251 maxEB (increase max effective balance): added to Pectra
• EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) : considered for inclusion in Pectra, review in 4 weeks, doing both
maxEB + IL increases upgrade complexity and deprioritizes peerDAS
EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) : considered for inclusion in Pectra, review in 4 weeks, doing both maxEB
+ IL increases upgrade complexity and deprioritizes peerDAS
• EIP7659 increase blob throughput proposal to increase to target of 8 & maximum of 16 blobs per block
(up from 3/6) over 4 months
EIP7659 increase blob throughput proposal to increase to target of 8 & maximum of 16 blobs per block
• Light client proposals : EIP7658 light client data backfill & EIP7657 sync committee slashings
Light client proposals : EIP7658 light client data backfill & EIP7657 sync committee slashings
• P2P proposals: network shards, IDONTWANT control message & deprecate mplex
P2P proposals: network shards, IDONTWANT control message & deprecate mplex
• EIP7251 maxEB (increase max effective balance): Breakout call notes
EIP7251 maxEB (increase max effective balance):
• Breakout call notes
• EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists): Breakout call video and notes : plan to finalize proof of concept
(PoC) specs, begin client PoC implementations & interop on a devnet Terence: changes to support blob
transactions within existing IL design
EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists):
• Breakout call video and notes : plan to finalize proof of concept (PoC) specs, begin client PoC
implementations & interop on a devnet
Breakout call video and notes : plan to finalize proof of concept (PoC) specs, begin client PoC
• Terence: changes to support blob transactions within existing IL design
Terence: changes to support blob transactions within existing IL design
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 30.59% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 30.59% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 66% majority Coinbase migrated to
~50% Nethermind Geth vulnerability disclosed : all EL clients updated to safe RPC limits Nethermind
post mortem of January block processing issue Consensus layer: Prysm 38% majority Any client bug over
33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
• Execution layer: Geth 66% majority Coinbase migrated to ~50% Nethermind Geth vulnerability disclosed
: all EL clients updated to safe RPC limits Nethermind post mortem of January block processing issue
Execution layer: Geth 66% majority
• Coinbase migrated to ~50% Nethermind
Coinbase migrated to ~50% Nethermind
• Geth vulnerability disclosed : all EL clients updated to safe RPC limits
Geth vulnerability disclosed : all EL clients updated to safe RPC limits
• Nethermind post mortem of January block processing issue
Nethermind post mortem of January block processing issue
• Consensus layer: Prysm 38% majority
Consensus layer: Prysm 38% majority
• Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
• Eric Conner & Mariano Conti campaign to raise the gas limit to 40M
Eric Conner & Mariano Conti campaign to raise the gas limit to 40M
• Calldata.pics : live charts of calldata & blob usage
Calldata.pics : live charts of calldata & blob usage
• ethPandaOps: Attacknet : inject faults into a devnet, uses Kurtosis & Chaos Mesh Dencun upgrade
analysis : open questions on reorg rate, attestation effectiveness & safely increasing blob parameters
ethPandaOps:
• Attacknet : inject faults into a devnet, uses Kurtosis & Chaos Mesh
Attacknet : inject faults into a devnet, uses Kurtosis & Chaos Mesh
• Dencun upgrade analysis : open questions on reorg rate, attestation effectiveness & safely
increasing blob parameters
Dencun upgrade analysis : open questions on reorg rate, attestation effectiveness & safely increasing
blob parameters
• Dencun diary : contributor reflections, future priorities & improvement suggestions
Dencun diary : contributor reflections, future priorities & improvement suggestions
Client Releases
• Consensus layer: Lighthouse v5.1.2 : hotfix for block lookup duplicate requests and to stop
propagation of slashings for slashed attesters
Consensus layer:
• Lighthouse v5.1.2 : hotfix for block lookup duplicate requests and to stop propagation of slashings
for slashed attesters
• Execution layer: Erigon v2.59.0 : post Dencun fixes Reth v0.2.0-beta.3 : fix critical in static
files that could lead to inconsistent storage state
Execution layer:
• Erigon v2.59.0 : post Dencun fixes
Erigon v2.59.0 : post Dencun fixes
• Reth v0.2.0-beta.3 : fix critical in static files that could lead to inconsistent storage state
Reth v0.2.0-beta.3 : fix critical in static files that could lead to inconsistent storage state
Research
• Discouragement attack against centralized validator sets
Layer 2
• Optimism fault proofs live on OP Sepolia testnet
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs: EIP7657 : Sync committee slashings EIP7658 : Light client data backfill EIP7659 : Stepwise
blob throughput increase
EIPs:
• EIP7657 : Sync committee slashings
EIP7657 : Sync committee slashings
• EIP7658 : Light client data backfill
EIP7658 : Light client data backfill
• EIP7659 : Stepwise blob throughput increase
EIP7659 : Stepwise blob throughput increase
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7656 : Generalized token-linked contracts
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7656 : Generalized token-linked contracts
Stuff for developers
• Etherscan contract verification updated : multichain verification with single API key and suggest
name tags, labels & URL
Etherscan contract verification updated : multichain verification with single API key and suggest name
tags, labels & URL
• OpenSea Seaport v1.6 : adds Seaport hooks
OpenSea Seaport v1.6 : adds Seaport hooks
• 555 NFT : onchain audio & SVG
555 NFT : onchain audio & SVG
• Guide to implementing stateful invariant testing with Halmos
Guide to implementing stateful invariant testing with Halmos
• Ethernaut-cli (tool box): built on Hardhat tasks, AI requires OpenAI API key; beta
Ethernaut-cli (tool box): built on Hardhat tasks, AI requires OpenAI API key; beta
• Ec (Rust library): convert bytes into minimal number of blobs
Ec (Rust library): convert bytes into minimal number of blobs
• Lodestar Prover : middleware wrapper around light client for dapps
Lodestar Prover : middleware wrapper around light client for dapps
• CTFs: OpenZeppelin Ethernaut CTF 2024 challenges & solutions
CTFs:
• OpenZeppelin Ethernaut CTF 2024 challenges & solutions
• Cyfrin Updraft adds web3 DevOps & Assembly & Formal Verification courses
Cyfrin Updraft adds web3 DevOps & Assembly & Formal Verification courses
• Reminder: Goerli testnet sunsets Apr 17, most validators have shutdown, opportunity to research
long-range attacks Use Sepolia testnet for application layer testing
Reminder: Goerli testnet sunsets Apr 17, most validators have shutdown, opportunity to research
long-range attacks
• Use Sepolia testnet for application layer testing
Security
• Super Sushi Samurai $4.8M exploit on Blast via transferring to self to double balance, white hat
Super Sushi Samurai $4.8M exploit on Blast via transferring to self to double balance, white hat
• Dolomite $1.8M exploit of old contracts, revoke approvals
Dolomite $1.8M exploit of old contracts, revoke approvals
• ParaSwap Augustus V6 contract vulnerability , white hat, revoke approvals
ParaSwap Augustus V6 contract vulnerability , white hat, revoke approvals
• AirDAO LP drained via social engineering
AirDAO LP drained via social engineering
• Finding an ERC4626 vault reentrancy , $3M was at risk
Finding an ERC4626 vault reentrancy , $3M was at risk
• Trail of Bits: weAudit (VSCode extension), collaborative note taking & highlight code regions
Trail of Bits: weAudit (VSCode extension), collaborative note taking & highlight code regions
Ecosystem
• Pascal Caversaccio: Ethereum cypherpunk manifesto
Pascal Caversaccio: Ethereum cypherpunk manifesto
• ETHGlobal London hackathon winners
ETHGlobal London hackathon winners
Enterprise
• Enterprise Ethereum Alliance new leadership team: Karen Scarbrough - Executive Director, Paul Brody
- Chairperson and Vanessa Grellet joins board
Enterprise Ethereum Alliance new leadership team: Karen Scarbrough - Executive Director, Paul Brody -
Chairperson and Vanessa Grellet joins board
• Google search for an ENS address shows Ether balance
Google search for an ENS address shows Ether balance
Job Listings
• Waku is hiring! Protocol Engineer , Waku SDK Software Engineer & Researcher
Waku is hiring! Protocol Engineer , Waku SDK Software Engineer & Researcher
• IFT / Logos : ZK Researcher (Nomos); ZK Researcher (Vac) & ZK Engineer x2
IFT / Logos : ZK Researcher (Nomos); ZK Researcher (Vac) & ZK Engineer x2
• Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer & FV Wizard
Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer & FV Wizard
• Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
• 👾OpenZeppelin seeks Security Researchers in Canada , Australia , LatAm & USA
👾OpenZeppelin seeks Security Researchers in Canada , Australia , LatAm & USA
• TechOps are looking for DevOps . Work on projects such as MakerDAO.
TechOps are looking for DevOps . Work on projects such as MakerDAO.
• ChainSafe seek a Head of Protocol Engineering
ChainSafe seek a Head of Protocol Engineering
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
• Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 16.4 to 121.8 gwei, with 32.4 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 22.8 gwei 7k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 16.4 to 121.8 gwei, with 32.4 gwei average
• Zero net issuance currently at 22.8 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.8 gwei
• 7k ETH net burn this week
7k ETH net burn this week
• ETHUSD : $3,107 - $3,757, currently $3,305
ETHUSD : $3,107 - $3,757, currently $3,305
• ETHBTC : currently 0.052 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.052 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
• BlackRock USD institutional digital liquidity fund (BUIDL), stable token pays dividends in tokens
monthly for qualified investors
BlackRock USD institutional digital liquidity fund (BUIDL), stable token pays dividends in tokens
• Nexus Mutual bundled protocol cover , protection for multiple protocols under a single listing
Nexus Mutual bundled protocol cover , protection for multiple protocols under a single listing
Regulation/business/tokens
• Ethereum is first (“profitable”) chain where burned transaction fees are greater than lifetime
issuance
Ethereum is first (“profitable”) chain where burned transaction fees are greater than lifetime
• Fortune: SEC issues subpoenas regarding dealings with EF EF removed warrant canary from website in
Feb 26 commit: “received a voluntary enquiry from a state authority that included a requirement for
confidentiality”
Fortune: SEC issues subpoenas regarding dealings with EF
• EF removed warrant canary from website in Feb 26 commit: “received a voluntary enquiry from a state
authority that included a requirement for confidentiality”
• SEC sanctioned for bad faith conduct in DEBT Box case
SEC sanctioned for bad faith conduct in DEBT Box case
• Genesis $21M settlement with SEC for charges of unregistered offer & sale of securities
Genesis $21M settlement with SEC for charges of unregistered offer & sale of securities
General
• Polygon PoS added secp256r1 curve precompile (RIP7212)
Polygon PoS added secp256r1 curve precompile (RIP7212)
• GoFetch : side channel attack using data memory-dependent prefetchers in Apple silicon
GoFetch : side channel attack using data memory-dependent prefetchers in Apple silicon
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-march-23-2024
